Package it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DhcpClientListener
    A DhcpClientListener listenes the changes of the client state
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressDatabase
    Class AddressDatabase allows the management of allocated IP addresses
    DhcpAdv
    DhcpAdv periodically sends MHCP advertisement messages
    DhcpClient
    Class DhcpClient implements a simple DHCP or MHCP client.
    DhcpClientAdapter
    Class DhcpClientAdapter extends DhcpClient implementing DhcpClientListener.
    DhcpMessage
    DhcpMessage is the base class for managing DHCP request and response messages
    DhcpServer
    Class DhcpServer implements a simple state-less DHCP or MHCP server.
    DhcpStack
    Default dhcp settings and static methods for loading, saving, and managing dhcp stuffs.
    Mangle
    DhcpMangle collects all static methods for mangling dhcp binary-data structures
    MessageFactory
    MessageFactory includes static methods to forge new dhcp request and/or reply messages
